full_summary:
=====================================

### Solicitation Title: Knowledge Mobilization for the Canadian Architecture Profession

#### Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: 23-58275
*   **Publication Date**: April 11, 2024
*   **Closing Date**: April 26, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
*   **Location**: Canada

#### Business Requirements

The National Research Council of Canada is soliciting a contractor to lead the design, planning, and delivery of a knowledge mobilization program on the decarbonization of the construction sector and Whole Building Life-Cycle Assessment (LCA). This program aims to accelerate the adoption of LCA and low-carbon construction practices among Canadian professional architects.

#### Scope of Work

The contractor will be responsible for:

*   Leading the design and planning of the knowledge mobilization program
*   Engaging with the Canadian architectural community of practice to promote the adoption of LCA and low-carbon construction practices
*   Delivering a series of nine in-person full-day sessions across Canada in major cities in western, central, and eastern Canada, as well as one virtual session
*   Providing educational materials and resources to support the adoption of LCA and low-carbon construction practices

#### Performance Criteria

The success of the contractor will be measured based on the following performance criteria:

*   The extent to which the knowledge mobilization program achieves its objectives
*   The quality and impact of the educational materials and resources provided
*   The contractor's ability to engage with and satisfy the needs of the Canadian architectural community of practice

#### Selection Criteria

The selection of the contractor will be based on the following criteria:

*   The contractor's experience and expertise in leading knowledge mobilization programs and engaging with the professional architecture community

#### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade
